A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: meh. my friend fell asleep during it\, she isnt a SW fan but enjoys sci fi. And as a HUGE SW fan I was greatly disappointed. No passion\, annoying new noisy characters\, ruining old characters....man\, I got that nauseous feeling I had 3/4 through Phantom Menace while asking myself \"Man\, is this it?\". At least PM had Darth maul light saber duel at the end which left me with a smile and some hope\, but this? Probably worse or second worse SW movie....
